54  // add a Rinex3NavData to the store
55  // @param Rinex3NavData Rdata data to be added
56  // @return true if data was added, false otherwise
57  bool Rinex3EphemerisStore::addEphemeris(const Rinex3NavData& inRdata)
58  {
59  Rinex3NavData Rdata(inRdata);
60  TimeSystem ts = TimeSystem::GPS;
61 #pragma unused(ts)
62 
63  switch(Rdata.sat.system) {
64  case SatID::systemGPS:
65  {
66  Rdata.time = correctTimeSystem(Rdata.time, TimeSystem::GPS);
67  GPSEphemeris eph(Rdata);
68  return ORBstore.addEphemeris(dynamic_cast<OrbitEph*>(&eph));
69  break;
70  }
71 
72  case SatID::systemGalileo:
73  {
74  Rdata.time = correctTimeSystem(Rdata.time, TimeSystem::GAL);
75  GalEphemeris eph(Rdata);
76  return ORBstore.addEphemeris(dynamic_cast<OrbitEph*>(&eph));
77  break;
78  }
79 
80  case SatID::systemBeiDou:
81  {
82  Rdata.time = correctTimeSystem(Rdata.time, TimeSystem::BDT);
83  BDSEphemeris eph(Rdata);
84  return ORBstore.addEphemeris(dynamic_cast<OrbitEph*>(&eph));
85  break;
86  }
87 
88  case SatID::systemQZSS:
89  {
90  Rdata.time = correctTimeSystem(Rdata.time, TimeSystem::QZS);
91  QZSEphemeris eph(Rdata);
92  return ORBstore.addEphemeris(dynamic_cast<OrbitEph*>(&eph));
93  break;
94  }
95 
96  case SatID::systemGlonass:
97  Rdata.time = correctTimeSystem(Rdata.time, TimeSystem::GLO);
98  return GLOstore.addEphemeris(GloEphemeris(Rdata));
99  break;
100 
101  case SatID::systemGeosync:
102  //return GEOstore.addEphemeris(GeoEphemeris(Rdata));
103  break;
104 
105  default:
106  break;
107  }
108  return false;
109  }
110 
111  // load the given Rinex navigation file
112  // return -1 failed to open file,
113  // -2 failed to read header (this->Rhead),
114  // -3 failed to read data (this->Rdata),
115  // >=0 number of nav records read
116  int Rinex3EphemerisStore::loadFile(const string& filename, bool dump, ostream& s)
117  {
118  try {
119  int nread(0);
120  Rinex3NavStream strm;
121  what = string();
122 
123  strm.open(filename.c_str(), ios::in);
124  if(!strm.is_open()) {
125  what = string("File ") + filename + string(" could not be opened.");
126  return -1;
127  }
128  strm.exceptions(ios::failbit);
129 
130  try { strm >> Rhead; }
131  catch(Exception& e) {
132  what = string("Failed to read header of file ") + filename
133  + string(" : ") + e.getText();
134  return -2;
135  }
136  if(dump) Rhead.dump(s);
137 
138  // add to FileStore
139  NavFiles.addFile(filename, Rhead);
140 
141  // add to mapTimeCorr
142  if(Rhead.mapTimeCorr.size() > 0) {
143  map<string, TimeSystemCorrection>::const_iterator it;
144  for(it=Rhead.mapTimeCorr.begin(); it!=Rhead.mapTimeCorr.end(); ++it)
145  addTimeCorr(it->second);
146  }
147 
148  while(1) {
149  // read the record
150  try { strm >> Rdata; }
151  catch(Exception& e) {
152  what = string("Failed to read data in file ") + filename
153  + string(" : ") + e.getText();
154  return -3;
155  }
156  catch(exception& e) {
157  what = string("std excep: ") + e.what();
158  return -3;
159  }
160  catch(...) {
161  what = string("Unknown exception while reading data of file ")
162  + filename;
163  return -3;
164  }
165 
166  if(!strm.good() || strm.eof()) break;
167 
168  nread++;
169  if(dump) Rdata.dump(s);
170 
171  try {
172  addEphemeris(Rdata);
173  }
174  catch(Exception& e) {
175  cout << "addEphemeris caught excp " << e.what();
176  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
177  }
178  }
179 
180  return nread;
181  }
182  catch(Exception& e) {
183  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
184  }
185 
186  } // end Rinex3EphemerisStore::loadFile
187 
188  // Find the appropriate time system correction object in the collection for the
189  // given time systems, and dump it to a string and return that string.
190  string Rinex3EphemerisStore::dumpTimeSystemCorrection(
191  const TimeSystem fromSys, const TimeSystem toSys) const
192  {
193  string msg;
194  ostringstream oss;
195  oss << "Convert from " << fromSys.asString()
196  << " to " << toSys.asString() << " : ";
197 
198  if(toSys == fromSys) {
199  oss << "time systems are the same";
200  return oss.str();
201  }
202 
203  // look up the TimeSystemCorr in list, and dump it
204  map<string, TimeSystemCorrection>::const_iterator it;
205  for(it = mapTimeCorr.begin(); it != mapTimeCorr.end(); ++it) {
206  if(it->second.isConverterFor(fromSys, toSys)) {
207  it->second.dump(oss);
208  return oss.str();
209  }
210  }
211  oss << "conversion not found!";
212  return oss.str();
213  }
214 
215  // Utility routine for getXvt and addEphemeris to convert time systems.
216  // Convert ttag to the target time system, using the first appropriate correction
217  // in the list, and return it. If no correction is found, ttag is unchanged and
218  // an exception is thrown.
219  CommonTime Rinex3EphemerisStore::correctTimeSystem(const CommonTime ttag,
220  const TimeSystem targetSys)
221  const
222  {
223  CommonTime toReturn(ttag);
224  TimeSystem fromSys(ttag.getTimeSystem());
225 
226  // is a conversion necessary?
227  if(fromSys == targetSys)
228  return toReturn;
229 
230  // first correct for leap seconds
231  const CivilTime civt(ttag);
232  double dt = TimeSystem::Correction(fromSys, targetSys,
233  civt.year, civt.month, civt.day);
234  toReturn += dt;
235  // the corrected timetag: now only the system, not the value, matters
236  toReturn.setTimeSystem(targetSys);
237 
238  // look up the TimeSystemCorr in list, and do the conversion
239  map<string, TimeSystemCorrection>::const_iterator it;
240  for(it = mapTimeCorr.begin(); it != mapTimeCorr.end(); ++it) {
241  if(it->second.isConverterFor(fromSys, targetSys)) {
242  dt = it->second.Correction(ttag);
243  toReturn += dt;
244  return toReturn;
245  }
246  }
247 
248  // failure
249  //InvalidRequest e("Unable to convert time systems from "
250  // + ttag.getTimeSystem().asString() + " to " + targetSys.asString());
251  //GPSTK_THROW(e);
252 
253  return toReturn; // never reached, satisfy some compilers
254  }
255 
256  // Returns the position, velocity, and clock offset of the indicated
257  // object in ECEF coordinates (meters) at the indicated time.
258  // @param[in] sat the satellite of interest
259  // @param[in] ttag the time to look up
260  // @return the Xvt of the object at the indicated time
261  // @throw InvalidRequest If the request can not be completed for any
262  // reason, this is thrown. The text may have additional
263  // information as to why the request failed.
264  Xvt Rinex3EphemerisStore::getXvt(const SatID& sat, const CommonTime& inttag) const
265  {
266  try {
267  Xvt xvt;
268  CommonTime ttag;
269  TimeSystem ts;
270 
271  switch(sat.system) {
272  case SatID::systemGPS:
273  case SatID::systemGalileo:
274  case SatID::systemBeiDou:
275  case SatID::systemQZSS:
276  if(sat.system == SatID::systemGPS ) ts = TimeSystem::GPS;
277  if(sat.system == SatID::systemGalileo) ts = TimeSystem::GAL;
278  if(sat.system == SatID::systemBeiDou ) ts = TimeSystem::BDT;
279  if(sat.system == SatID::systemQZSS ) ts = TimeSystem::QZS;
280  ttag = correctTimeSystem(inttag, ts);
281  xvt = ORBstore.getXvt(sat,ttag);
282  break;
283  case SatID::systemGlonass:
284  ttag = correctTimeSystem(inttag, TimeSystem::GLO);
285  xvt = GLOstore.getXvt(sat,ttag);
286  break;
287  //case SatID::systemGeosync:
288  // ttag = correctTimeSystem(inttag, TimeSystem::GEO);
289  // xvt = GEOstore.getXvt(sat,ttag);
290  // break;
291  default:
292  InvalidRequest e("Unsupported satellite system");
293  GPSTK_THROW(e);
294  break;
295  }
296 
297  return xvt;
298  }
299  catch(InvalidRequest& ir) { GPSTK_RETHROW(ir); }
300  }
301 
302  // Dump information about the store to an ostream.
303  // @param[in] os ostream to receive the output; defaults to cout
304  // @param[in] detail integer level of detail to provide; allowed values are
305  // 0: number of satellites, time step and time limits (default)
306  // 1: above plus flags, gap and interval values, and number of data/sat
307  // 2: above plus all the data tables
308  void Rinex3EphemerisStore::dump(ostream& os, short detail) const
309  {
310  os << "Dump of Rinex3EphemerisStore:\n";
311  // dump the time system corrections
312  map<string,TimeSystemCorrection>::const_iterator tcit;
313  for(tcit=mapTimeCorr.begin(); tcit != mapTimeCorr.end(); ++tcit) {
314  tcit->second.dump(os);
315  os << "\n";
316  }
317 
318  NavFiles.dump(os, detail);
319 
320  if(ORBstore.size()) {
321  os << "Dump of GPS/GAL/BDS/QZS ephemeris store:\n";
322  ORBstore.dump(os, detail);
323  }
324 
325  if(GLOstore.size()) {
326  os << "Dump of GLO ephemeris store:\n";
327  GLOstore.dump(os, detail);
328  }
329 
330  //if(GEOstore.size()) {
331  //os << "Dump of GEO ephemeris store:\n";
332  //GEOstore.dump(os, detail);
333  //}
334 
335  os << "End dump of Rinex3EphemerisStore\n";
336  }
337 
338  // Determine the earliest time for which this object can successfully
339  // determine the Xvt for any object.
340  // @return the earliest time in the table
341  // @throw InvalidRequest if the object has no data.
342  CommonTime Rinex3EphemerisStore::getInitialTime(void) const
343  {
344  try {
345  CommonTime retTime(CommonTime::END_OF_TIME),time;
346 
347  // CommonTime does not allow comparisions unless TimeSystems agree,
348  // or if one is "Any"
349  retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
350 
351  time = ORBstore.getInitialTime();
352  if(time < retTime) {
353  retTime = time;
354  retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
355  }
356  time = GLOstore.getInitialTime();
357  if(time < retTime) {
358  retTime = time;
359  retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
360  }
361  //time = GEOstore.getInitialTime();
362  //if(time < retTime) {
363  // retTime = time;
364  // retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
365  //}
366 
367  return retTime;
368  }
369  catch(InvalidRequest& ir) { GPSTK_RETHROW(ir); }
370  }
371 
372  // Determine the latest time for which this object can successfully
373  // determine the Xvt for any object.
374  // @return the latest time in the table
375  // @throw InvalidRequest if the object has no data.
376  CommonTime Rinex3EphemerisStore::getFinalTime(void) const
377  {
378  try {
379  CommonTime retTime(CommonTime::BEGINNING_OF_TIME),time;
380 
381  // CommonTime does not allow comparisions unless TimeSystems agree,
382  // or if one is "Any"
383  retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
384 
385  time = ORBstore.getInitialTime();
386  if(time > retTime) {
387  retTime = time;
388  retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
389  }
390  time = GLOstore.getInitialTime();
391  if(time > retTime) {
392  retTime = time;
393  retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
394  }
395  //time = GEOstore.getInitialTime();
396  //if(time > retTime) {
397  // retTime = time;
398  // retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
399  //}
400 
401  return retTime;
402  }
403  catch(InvalidRequest& ir) { GPSTK_RETHROW(ir); }
404  }

406  // Determine the earliest time for which this object can successfully
407  // determine the Xvt for any object.
408  // @param SatID sat satellite, or system if sat.id==-1
409  // @return the earliest time in the table
410  // @throw InvalidRequest if the object has no data.
411  CommonTime Rinex3EphemerisStore::getInitialTime(const SatID& sat) const
412  {
413  try {
414  if(sat.system == SatID::systemMixed)
415  return getInitialTime();
416 
417  CommonTime retTime(CommonTime::END_OF_TIME),time;
418  retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
419 
420  switch(sat.system) {
421  case SatID::systemGPS:
422  case SatID::systemGalileo:
423  case SatID::systemBeiDou:
424  case SatID::systemQZSS:
425  retTime = ORBstore.getInitialTime(sat);
426  case SatID::systemGlonass:
427  retTime = GLOstore.getInitialTime(sat);
428  //case SatID::systemGeosync:
429  //retTime = GEOstore.getInitialTime(sat);
430  default:
431  break;
432  }
433 
434  return retTime;
435  }
436  catch(InvalidRequest& ir) { GPSTK_RETHROW(ir); }
437  }
438 
439  // Determine the latest time for which this object can successfully
440  // determine the Xvt for any object.
441  // @param SatID sat satellite, or system if sat.id==-1
442  // @return the latest time in the table
443  // @throw InvalidRequest if the object has no data.
444  CommonTime Rinex3EphemerisStore::getFinalTime(const SatID& sat) const
445  {
446  try {
447  if(sat.system == SatID::systemMixed)
448  return getFinalTime();
449 
450  CommonTime retTime(CommonTime::BEGINNING_OF_TIME);
451  retTime.setTimeSystem(TimeSystem::Any);
452 
453  switch(sat.system) {
454  case SatID::systemGPS:
455  case SatID::systemGalileo:
456  case SatID::systemBeiDou:
457  case SatID::systemQZSS:
458  retTime = ORBstore.getFinalTime(sat);
459  case SatID::systemGlonass:
460  retTime = GLOstore.getFinalTime(sat);
461  //case SatID::systemGeosync:
462  //retTime = GEOstore.getFinalTime(sat);
463  default:
464  break;
465  }
466 
467 
468  return retTime;
469  }
470  catch(InvalidRequest& ir) { GPSTK_RETHROW(ir); }
471  }
472 
473  // use to access the data records in the store in bulk
474  int Rinex3EphemerisStore::addToList(list<Rinex3NavData>& theList, SatID sysSat)
475  const
476  {
477  int n(0);
478 
479  // pure fussiness
480  const bool keepAll(sysSat.system == SatID::systemMixed);
481  const bool keepGPS(keepAll || sysSat.system==SatID::systemGPS);
482  const bool keepGAL(keepAll || sysSat.system==SatID::systemGalileo);
483  const bool keepGLO(keepAll || sysSat.system==SatID::systemGlonass);
484  const bool keepBDS(keepAll || sysSat.system==SatID::systemBeiDou);
485  const bool keepQZS(keepAll || sysSat.system==SatID::systemQZSS);
486  const bool keepGEO(keepAll || sysSat.system==SatID::systemGeosync);
487  const bool keepOrb(keepAll || keepGPS || keepGAL || keepBDS || keepQZS);
488 #pragma unused(keepGEO)
489 
490  if(keepOrb) {
491  list<OrbitEph*> OElist;
492  ORBstore.addToList(OElist);
493 
494  list<OrbitEph*>::const_iterator it;
495  for(it=OElist.begin(); it != OElist.end(); ++it) {
496  OrbitEph *ptr = *it;
497  if((ptr->satID).system == SatID::systemGPS && keepGPS) {
498  GPSEphemeris *sysptr = dynamic_cast<GPSEphemeris*>(ptr);
499  theList.push_back(Rinex3NavData(*sysptr));
500  n++;
501  }
502  else if((ptr->satID).system == SatID::systemGalileo && keepGAL) {
503  GalEphemeris *sysptr = dynamic_cast<GalEphemeris*>(ptr);
504  theList.push_back(Rinex3NavData(*sysptr));
505  n++;
506  }
507  else if((ptr->satID).system == SatID::systemBeiDou && keepBDS) {
508  BDSEphemeris *sysptr = dynamic_cast<BDSEphemeris*>(ptr);
509  theList.push_back(Rinex3NavData(*sysptr));
510  n++;
511  }
512  else if((ptr->satID).system == SatID::systemQZSS && keepQZS) {
513  QZSEphemeris *sysptr = dynamic_cast<QZSEphemeris*>(ptr);
514  theList.push_back(Rinex3NavData(*sysptr));
515  n++;
516  }
517  }
518  }
519  if(keepGLO) {
520  list<GloEphemeris> GLOlist;
521  n += GLOstore.addToList(GLOlist);
522 
523  list<GloEphemeris>::const_iterator it;
524  for(it=GLOlist.begin(); it != GLOlist.end(); ++it)
525  theList.push_back(Rinex3NavData(*it));
526  }
527  /*
528  if(keepGEO) {
529  list<GeoRecord> GEOlist;
530  n += GEOstore.addToList(GEOlist);
531 
532  list<GeoRecord>::const_iterator it;
533  for(it=GEOlist.begin(); it != GEOlist.end(); ++it)
534  theList.push_back(Rinex3NavData(*it));
535  }
536  */
537  return n;
538  }
